value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ah! Hello, $Nu!$k$pWe have another exciting day
to look forward to!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Commander Anna will be here with
a new mission for us soon, and—$k$p$EFace_Pain|I-is something wrong? You look
a bit confused...$k$pWe are here with the rest of the
Order of Heroes. You remember,
don't you?$k$pHas something happened? You don't
look well...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Hello, everyone! We have a new
mission awaiting us! A strange light
has appeared near our borders...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_04,0|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$Fo1000,255,255,255,255|$Fi1000|$EFace_Pain|...H-huh? Wh-what's going on?
Where is this light coming from?!$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Wh-who are you?!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Do not be afraid, children of Midgard.
I am not your foe.$k$pI have come here to save your
mortal world from the wicked
Golden Seer.$k$pI am Seiðr. I come from a world
beyond Midgard... I am a goddess
of Vanaheimr, the realm of light.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-you're a...a goddess?!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Do not fear, child. You have met
my kind before.$k$pDream-King Freyr and Freyja,
the Lady of Nightmare, are my kin.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It's true... We have met a number
of gods in our travels between the
many worlds.$k$pYou said you came here...to save us?$k$pWhat do you mean? Who is this
seer you speak of?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|One amongst you already holds the
answer to your questions.$k$p...You have seen the future
that awaits you, have you not,
$Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You...know $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|With the power granted to me as
a goddess, I have given you a gift of
revelation, $Nu.$k$pIf you do nothing to change events,
there is only one outcome that awaits
you: doom.$k$pI have come to change that.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The enemy is upon us! Where did
they come from?!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's Gullveig... She has sent her
forces here from sometime in
the future.$k$pYou must hurry, children of Midgard.
The invasion of time has begun.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We were able to repel them
somehow, but...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|As long as Gullveig remains, such
foes will continue to appear all
across this land.$k$pWe have not much time left.$k$p$EFace|We must go to my realm...to the
realm of light, Vanaheimr. That is
why I have come; to guide you.$k$pKing Njörðr will know what we
must do. Now, quickly, we must
hurry to him.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|One moment! Can we discuss this
amongst ourselves, privately, before
we decide we'll be following you?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Of course, child of Midgard.
Go ahead.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Can we actually trust her?
She seems friendly, but...$k$pLet's not forget that Loki and Thórr
are gods too... I am not convinced
this bodes well.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Really? But Seiðr seems like a proper
goddess! And they say goddesses
don't lie, so I believe in her!$k$pGoddesses punish only those who
are unfaithful—but they're kind to
people who are good and honest!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|We have no evidence to prove
anything either way. Not yet,
at least.$k$pI think we should proceed until
evidence presents itself.$k$p$EFace|Would you agree to that,
$Nu?$k$p$Sbs150|
